title: Is there any way I can earn money online without any kind of investment? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is how I earned money online without any kind of investment. A few years ago, both my husband and I lost our jobs because the company that we both worked for suddenly shut down. This unfortunate experience led us to make an important decision – we need to start creating diverse streams of income and never again solely rely on our jobs for income. After some research, we found out that the easiest and quickest way to make money on the side without any investment is to offer a service that people need and are willing to pay for. So, what service should we offer? We had two options: We sell our own skillsWe sell other professionals’ skillsBut, we decided to sell other professionals’ skills in the end. Because it is scalable and we can leverage other professionals’ time. Let me give you a scenario: For example, your neighbor asks whether you would be able to look after their 3 year old kid for a few hours for $200. You say “Sure, why not?” So, your neighbor gives you $200 and goes off. Then, suddenly you remember that you had already made plans to go somewhere at night and will not be able to take care of your neighbor’s 3-year-old kid. But you do not want to give up the $200! So, you call your good and reliable friend up and ask her if she would like to look after a 3 year old for a few hours for $100. She agrees. Outcome: You made $100 and did not have to babysit the 3-year-old. Now, imagine if you have 5 people asking you to babysit their children around the same time on the same night. And each of them is offering you $200 to babysit for the night. If you were to babysit the children yourself, you could only babysit one of those children and pocket $200. Not bad. But what if you get 5 friends to help babysit for you and you pay them $100 each? You would get $500 and not even have to babysit one child! In fact, you could even be out watching a movie and pocket the $500! That’s the power of leveraging other people’s time! Moreover, we can free up our time to focus on finding more clients instead of spending most of our time fulfilling the work. We call this little business Service Arbitrage. How it works is that you find in-demand services that are already offered by freelancers at very cheap price. Next, you market the services to people who need it at a higher price. Once you get a sale, you get the freelancer to do the work for you and pocket the price difference as your profit.

It’s almost 3 years, I am doing online jobs from home without any investment and make profit by this type of work. I would like to provide you the guidelines to the common people like me on using online jobs to make money from home. So, please spend some time to understand each online jobs given below, and it will be easy for you to start and make money. Get Paid to Read AdsOnline Survey JobsGoogle Online JobsOnline Captcha Solving JobsBlogging & AffiliateFreelancing JobsData Entry JobsOnline Writing JobAmazon Online JobsOnline Micro JobsOnline Tutor JobsFacebook Online Jobs So, let’s analyze these methods individually: 1. Get Paid To & Read Ads. Advertisement is one of the biggest business in the world. Companies spend thousands to millions of dollars in advertising. Their prime goal is to reach their words to people, so they pay you for watching these ads. There are many websites where you can signup for getting paid to this. It is a great online work for people who can spend 10-20 minutes daily on their PC. More ads you will check, more money you will earn. 2. Online Survey Jobs. In online surveys, different companies ask for your opinion for their product or services, so that they can increase their sales. Once you join with online survey companies, they will send you the surveys in your email. The only thing you have to do is complete them & get paid. 3. Google Online Jobs. Google is one of the most respected and trusted company on the web. I can provide you 3 online jobs from Google to make excellent income. The first one is related to Google Ads, the second is related to the YouTube and the last one is related with your smartphone. There is no investment to be made anywhere and anyone can start working on these programs. 4. Captcha Solving Online Job. Captcha solving is one of the best online data entry jobs. You must know how captcha works. Whenever you create an account, you more likely than not run over this sort of picture. There are many organizations and people who needs to make a huge number of records day by day on prevalent locales. They use programming to make the records. However, these captcha picture anticipate them to make programmed accounts on these destinations. So you have to end up a captcha solver and enter the character accurately into the product. There is an extremely immense interest for captcha passage specialist. You can solve 1000 captchas in 1 to 2 hours relying upon your speed. You can procure $1 to $2 for each 1000 captcha you solve. In the event that you chip away at 2-3 locales, you can procure least Rs. 10,000 to Rs. 15,000 every month. 5. Blogging & Affiliate. You can create a personal, free or paid blog and make money from it.You have 3 steps to follow. First, you have to create a blog. Then you have to publish quality content once in a week. And third, you have to promote your blog. Creating a blog and posting something on your blog is simple. Blogging is my part-time online work and I make hight profit from this. Promoting affiliate products from your blog are a very good way to make some great income too. 6. Freelancing Jobs. That means provide your services to your costumers. Truly, freelancing job is one of the best work from home to make high income. All you need in this business is some skills, such as: writing, online promotion, web design, coding, singing, advising, creating videos, photography, image editing & many. 7. Data Entry Jobs. There are various types of data entry jobs available in India & globally. But, be careful, there are a lot of companies who cheat the people for providing fake data entry jobs. So, remember 2 things: NEVER pay any fee for any type of data entry or typing jobs.Check the reputation of the company by searching in Google.8. Online Writing Job. If you like writing, this is the best for you. Online writing jobs are becoming popular because each and every website on internet demands regular content to update their website/blog. You can get paid $5 to $20 per article depending on the content length. 9. Amazon Online Jobs. Amazon is one of the most respected shopping portal. You can also make great income with Amazon. Most of the online jobs are very simple and anyone with basic knowledge of internet and English can do this. You can even make thousands of dollars monthly with some of the options. 10. Online Micro Jobs. It means small jobs (or tasks) which takes few seconds or few minutes to complete. There are many sites like Amazon Turk, MicroWorkers which provide online micro jobs. You can earn 5 cents to $1 for completing each task (depending on the time duration of the tasks). You can also sharing a page, giving review or rating for a product or page, creating a testimonial, writing a short article, searching something from Google, or many other simple & easy tasks. If you work 1-2 hours a day you can earn $500 to $1000 if you live in USA, UK, Canada etc. & Rs 6,000 to Rs15,000 if you are from India or other country. 11. Online Tutor Jobs. If you love teaching and looking for something that can be done from home, online tutor jobs should be good for you. They are increasingly in demand and you can make great money teaching online to students in all over the world. There are many websites where you can join as a tutor and earn $20 or more per hour. 12. Facebook Online Jobs. Many millions of people use Facebook for chatting with friends and sharing pictures, but there are millions of people who are making money from Facebook. There are many ways that you can use on Facebook and gain high profit. You can earn money through your profile or by creating a page. You can even get paid for likes.  I showed you the list of the main and different way to start to make money online, with easy online jobs. Now you can decide which system you prefer to start earning money. You have several possibilities to get started, even with little or no skills. All you need is a personal computer and Wi-fi connession, then start with one or more of these methods. Now it's up to you to start and make good experience, good luck! Federico :)
